update.sql: alter table WorkspaceNode add column title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL

replace into WorkspaceNode( id, hidden, orderNumber, urlName, parent_id, title) select WorkspaceNode.id, WorkspaceNode.hidden, WorkspaceNode.orderNumber, WorkspaceNode.urlName, WorkspaceNode.parent_id, Material.title from WorkspaceNode inner join WorkspaceMaterial on WorkspaceNode.id = WorkspaceMaterial.id inner join Material on WorkspaceMaterial.materialId = material.id

replace into WorkspaceNode( id, hidden, orderNumber, urlName, parent_id, title) select WorkspaceNode.id, WorkspaceNode.hidden, WorkspaceNode.orderNumber, WorkspaceNode.urlName, WorkspaceNode.parent_id, WorkspaceFolder.title from WorkspaceNode inner join WorkspaceFolder on WorkspaceNode.id = WorkspaceFolder.id

replace into WorkspaceNode( id, hidden, orderNumber, urlName, parent_id, title) select WorkspaceNode.id, WorkspaceNode.hidden, WorkspaceNode.orderNumber, WorkspaceNode.urlName, WorkspaceNode.parent_id, 'Root' from WorkspaceNode inner join WorkspaceRootFolder on WorkspaceNode.id = WorkspaceRootFolder.id
alter table WorkspaceFolder drop column Title
